name: Embassy Suites Detroit - Livonia/Novi

reviews.text: This hotel is perfect for the business traveler. In the evening there is a happy hour with food and beverages. The rooms have a living room with a refrigerator and sink. The countertops are granite. The bedroom is separate from the living room. In the morning there is a buffet breakfast where you can have eggs, omelets or waffles cooked to order.
reviews.title: A Good Value
good hotel but...
reviews.text: This is a good place to stay for the money but there are some things to keep in mind before you book a room here.

reviews.title: A just "OK" hotel
reviews.text: First, check embassy suites website for deals. I found that they weren't anymore expensive (and in some cases were less expensive) than what you will find on travelocity, expedia or similar sites. Also re check the rates before you go. We booked the room for 129.00/night but I noticed that a week before we were scheduled to arrive the hotel had dropped their rates to 99.00/night. The hotel staff were very helpful and I had no problems getting the lower rate. This saved me approximately 90.00 on our stay so I was pleased with that.

reviews.title: What is that SMELL?
reviews.text: The overall look of the hotel is pleasant and well kept. Contrary to other reviews, we did not see chipped paint or any other obvious signs that the hotel isn't well maintained.

The hotel staff was very courteous and helpful. My entire family decided to stay here for my sister's wedding. She didn't book a block of rooms but when I asked if we could be placed close to each other, they did what they could and at least got us all on the same floor of the hotel.
reviews.title: What Remodel?

aka: Embassy Suites Detroit - Livonia/Novi Hotel Livonia
description: Located only a short drive from downtown Detroit is the Embassy Suites Detroit-Livonia/Novi hotel, an all-suite hotel with all the comforts of home. Guests unwind in spacious two-room suites featuring a private bedroom and living room. Each suite includes a large dining/work table, two cable televisions, two telephones, wireless Internet access, microwave, fridge, and coffee maker. The hotel offers complimentary full cooked-to-order breakfast in the morning, and complimentary drinks with light snacks at the Evening Reception every night. The Cascades on-site Restaurant serves lunch and dinner, and Room Service is also available. The hotel is welcome to large meetings and events. Guests who book the hotel for a wedding reception can also receive a complimentary on-site wedding ceremony in the gorgeous atrium. Guests enjoy recreational activities at the hotel's 24-hrfitness center, indoor pool and sauna. Business facilities include a 24-hour business center, complimentary printing service, meeting rooms, audio/visual equipment rental, and banquet facilities. Other amenities at the Livonia hotel include local area shuttle service, laundry service and safe deposit box. Guests of the Embassy Suites Detroit-Livonia/Novi hotel enjoy being near local attractions like Comerica Park, Ford Field, Henry Ford Museum, golf courses and casinos.
